author: dapplion
content: Implementing the engine API I wonder what should the consensus client do if:

author: dapplion
content: - calls prepare_payload and gets parent unknown. Who will resolve the situation? Will the execution client find that block on its own? Or is the consensus client expected to provide it?

author: dapplion
content: - calls prepare_payload and gets status syncing. For how long should the consensus client wait and do nothing? Should it keep attempting to do stuff and hitting the "is syncing" brick wall?

author: dapplion
content: - calls forkchoice_updated and execution client hasn't received the consensus validated status. Should the consensus client call consensus_validated, then retry forkchoice_updated? Or could the execution client just assume that any route in forkchoice_updated call params + prepare_payload is consensus_validated?
